# MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.nowPlayingItemOnly

**Case**

The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.

## Declaration

```swift
case nowPlayingItemOnly
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.none**: No language option change is to be made.
- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.permanent**: The language option change is applied to all future playback items.
